page.title: 20RIPPINGALE METHODISM/CREDITS
page.content: There is a 150 year history of {Methodism}in Rippingale.The present chapel was built in 1935 and services, including a children's club and Sunday school,are held every Sunday.It is part of the Bourne circuit,whose Minister is the Rev.E.Foster.About 85% of all services are taken by local preachers.The total membership is 12. Services for Baptisms,Weddings and Funerals also take place locally. {************************************** CREDITS {collected and collated by STELLA ILES * GLENYS & CHRIS PETZ { Contributors:}B.& J.Dorrington; S.& H.Ferne; F.Grime; Rev.R.Harris; K.Iles; S.Iles; G.Petz; C.& G.V.Petz; R.Sands; Dr.A.Surtees; J.Swanson; C.Wilde; J.Williamson. {************************************** { ***************
